title: Programming courses - Java, C, OCaml, HTML, JS, Node, NoSQL
description: Learn about Java, C, OCaml, Web-related languages (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, Node) and databases-related languages (SQL, NoSQL). We also have courses about Assembly, TypeScript, Cybersecurity, and API.

courses.name: Java
courses.title: Learn JAVA programming
courses.desc: The course is explaining a lot of concepts up to Java16, including graphical libraries like SWING, AWT, or JavaFX.

courses.name: WEB
courses.title: Learn WEB-related knowledge
courses.desc: How to start, what you need to know, ... and everything that couldn't be put in a specific language course.

courses.name: HTML
courses.title: Learn HTML programming
courses.desc: A complete summary of what you need to know in HTML to make a website.

courses.name: CSS
courses.title: Learn CSS programming
courses.desc: What's CSS and how you could use it to make your website looks better.

courses.name: JavaScript
courses.title: Learn JavaScript programming
courses.desc: A short introduction to JavaScript used to make interactive websites or required for Node.js/Typescript courses.
